alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:30PM EDT until June 16 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The City of Poquoson in southeastern Virginia... Northeastern Isle of Wight County in southeastern Virginia... York County in southeastern Virginia... The City of Hampton in southeastern Virginia... The City of Newport News in southeastern Virginia... Southeastern James City County in southeastern Virginia... East central Surry County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Busch Gardens, or near Williamsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grove around 435 PM EDT. Lee Hall and Fort Eustis around 440 PM EDT. Newport News around 445 PM EDT. Patrick Henry Field, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences and Denbigh around 450 PM EDT. Seaford, Christopher Newport University, Tabb and Beaconsdale around 455 PM EDT. Northampton around 500 PM EDT. Hampton and Langley AFB around 505 PM EDT. Hampton University around 510 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rushmere, Carrollton, Lackey, Oriana, Hilton Village, Newport News Golf Course, Poolesville, Oyster Point, Hog Island Game Reserve and Messick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Surry; York
